items.title: «Dort geht es nicht nur darum, eine Straftat zu ahnden, sondern auch eine Identität zu klären, eine Weg- oder Ausweisung vorzubereiten oder die Flucht beziehungsweise das Untertauchen zu verhindern»

“At a higher level, Boost Africa is supporting incubators, accelerators, early-stage and growth stage fund managers who then, in turn, invest in companies from the inception stage to the growth stage, to more mature companies,”

“We are delighted with the level of participation in this campaign, and we believe the winner selection process was as transparent as possible. Congratulations to all our fantastic investors, and we look forward to a memorable experience as we support the Uganda Cranes in their quest for AFCON glory,” “We are committed to investing in sports growth in Uganda. We are already involved in basketball and are looking to expand into other sports as well. This campaign is just one example of how we intend to give back to the community through sports,”

“Sinceramente non ho capito perché sia stato respinto – (\*) – anzi, dall’opposizione non hanno nemmeno scritto che è successa la stessa cosa sei mesi fa e potevano anche metterlo giù in tono decisamente polemico. A me è sembrato un ordine del giorno da recepire e comunque anche in maggioranza si può votare a favore di una pratica dell’opposizione, perché no? Nulla di polemico contro l’amministrazione, ma semplicemente l’accoglimento di un documento che, secondo me, era da votare”
“The decision to stage the opening ceremony in the Arena di Verona is not just an aesthetic one although, of course, we like to showcase such a beauty,”
